entries.title: Russia's Lavrov: Either Ukraine fulfils Moscow's proposals or our army will decide
entries.description: Russia's foreign minister appears to have ended any immediate prospect for peace talks over the Ukraine war, days after Russia's president said he was ready to negotiate.

entries.title: Taliban 'trying to erase women' from society in Afghanistan
entries.description: The foreign secretary has accused the Taliban of "trying to erase women from society in Afghanistan" after its ban on female NGO workers forced aid agencies to pull out.

entries.title: China to end COVID quarantine for international arrivals
entries.description: China is to lift the requirement for international travellers to quarantine from 8 January in the latest break from its zero-COVID policy after protests.

entries.title: Iranian ex-footballer says his wife and daughter were blocked from leaving country
entries.description: A record-breaking Iranian footballer who criticised the authorities' crackdown on anti-regime protesters has said his family were prevented from leaving the country.

entries.title: UN 'heartened' after reported arrest over death of Irish soldier in Lebanon
entries.description: The United Nations has said it is "heartened" by the support of Lebanese officials after a reported arrest over the death of an Irish soldier on a peacekeeping mission in the country.

entries.title: Dozens of Rohingya refugees wash up on Indonesia beach as 180 others feared drowned
entries.description: Dozens of Rohingya refugees have been found on a beach in Indonesia after weeks at sea in a rickety boat.

entries.title: Winter storm leaves 17 dead in Japan - including elderly woman found buried under heavy snow
entries.description: A powerful winter storm in Japan has killed 17, including a woman found buried under a heavy pile of snowfall, officials have said.

entries.title: South Korea scrambles fighter jets and attack helicopters after North Korean drones 'violate airspace'
entries.description: South Korea says it has scrambled fighter jets and attack helicopters, firing warning shots, after North Korean drones "violated" its airspace.

entries.title: China launches its largest incursion into Taiwan's air defence zone
entries.description: China has launched its largest incursion yet into Taiwan's air defence zone, the Taiwanese government has said.

entries.title: At least 50 dead as US and Canada gripped by devastating winter storm
entries.description: At least 50 deaths have been linked to a severe storm that continues to batter the US and Canada.
